00013 /***
00014 * int _os_support(int feature)
00015 *   - Checks if OS Supports the capablity or not
00016 *
00017 * Entry:
00018 *   feature: the feature we want to check if OS supports it.
00019 *
00020 * Exit:
00021 *   Returns 1 if OS support exist and 0 when OS doesn't support it.
00022 *
00023 ****************************************************************/
00024 
00025 int DLL_CALLCONV
00026 _os_support(int feature)
00027 {
00028     __try {
00029         switch (feature) {
00030         case _CPU_FEATURE_SSE:
00031             __asm {
00032                 xorps xmm0, xmm0        // executing SSE instruction
00033             }
00034             break;
00035         case _CPU_FEATURE_SSE2:
00036             __asm {
00037                 xorpd xmm0, xmm0        // executing SSE2 instruction
00038             }
00039             break;
00040         case _CPU_FEATURE_3DNOW:
00041             __asm {
00042                 pfrcp mm0, mm0          // executing 3DNow! instruction
00043                 emms
00044             }
00045             break;
00046         case _CPU_FEATURE_MMX:
00047             __asm {
00048                 pxor mm0, mm0           // executing MMX instruction
00049                 emms
00050             }
00051             break;
00052         }
00053     }
00054     __except (EXCEPTION_EXECUTE_HANDLER) {
00055         if (_exception_code() == STATUS_ILLEGAL_INSTRUCTION) {
00056             return 0;
00057         }
00058         return 0;
00059     }
00060     return 1;
00061 }
00062 
00063 void DLL_CALLCONV
00064 FreeImageAlgorithms_SSEFindFloatMinMax(const float *data, long n, float *min, float *max)
00065 {
00066         __m128 min128 = _mm_set_ps1(FLT_MAX);  // min128[0, 1, 2, 3] = FLT_MAX
00067     __m128 max128 = _mm_set_ps1(FLT_MIN);  // max128[0, 1, 2, 3] = FLT_MIN
00068 
00069     __m128* pSource = (__m128*) data;
00070    
00071         for ( int i = 0; i < n/4; i++ )
00072     {
00073         min128 =  _mm_min_ps(*pSource, min128);
00074         max128 =  _mm_max_ps(*pSource, max128);
00075 
00076         pSource++;
00077     }
00078 
00079         // extract minimum and maximum values from min128 and max128
00080     union u
00081     {
00082         __m128 m;
00083         float f[4];
00084     } x;
00085 
00086         x.m = min128;
00087     *min = min(x.f[0], min(x.f[1], min(x.f[2], x.f[3])));
00088 
00089     x.m = max128;
00090     *max = max(x.f[0], max(x.f[1], max(x.f[2], x.f[3])));
00091 }

00189 template<class Tsrc>
00190 class FIND_MINMAX_FOR_DIB
00191 {
00192 public:
00193         void find(FIBITMAP *src, double *min, double *max);
00194 };
00195 
00196 template<class Tsrc> void 
00197 FIND_MINMAX_FOR_DIB<Tsrc>::find(FIBITMAP *src, double *min, double *max)
00198 {
00199         if(!src)
00200                 return;
00201 
00202         int width = FreeImage_GetWidth(src);
00203         int height = FreeImage_GetHeight(src);
00204 
00205         double temp_min, temp_max;
00206         Tsrc l_min, l_max;
00207 
00208         // Get the first two pixel values for initialisation
00209         Tsrc *bits = reinterpret_cast<Tsrc*>(FreeImage_GetScanLine(src, 0));
00210         temp_min = temp_max = bits[0];
00211 
00212         for(int y = 0; y < height; y++) {
00213 
00214                 bits = reinterpret_cast<Tsrc*>(FreeImage_GetScanLine(src, y));
00215 
00216                 MAXMIN(bits, width, l_max, l_min);
00217 
00218                 if(l_max > temp_max) temp_max = l_max;
00219                 if(l_min < temp_min) temp_min = l_min;
00220         }
00221 
00222         *min = temp_min;
00223         *max = temp_max;
00224 }
00225 
00226 
00227 FIND_MINMAX_FOR_DIB<unsigned char>              minmaxUCharImage;
00228 FIND_MINMAX_FOR_DIB<unsigned short>             minmaxUShortImage;
00229 FIND_MINMAX_FOR_DIB<short>                              minmaxShortImage;
00230 FIND_MINMAX_FOR_DIB<unsigned long>              minmaxULongImage;
00231 FIND_MINMAX_FOR_DIB<long>                               minmaxLongImage;
00232 FIND_MINMAX_FOR_DIB<float>                              minmaxFloatImage;
00233 FIND_MINMAX_FOR_DIB<double>                             minmaxDoubleImage;
00234 
00235 void DLL_CALLCONV
00236 FreeImageAlgorithms_FindMinMax(FIBITMAP *src, double *min, double *max)
00237 {
00238         if(!src)
00239                 return;
00240 
00241         FREE_IMAGE_TYPE src_type = FreeImage_GetImageType(src);
00242 
00243         switch(src_type) {
00244                 case FIT_BITMAP:        // standard image: 1-, 4-, 8-, 16-, 24-, 32-bit
00245                         if(FreeImage_GetBPP(src) == 8)
00246                                 minmaxUCharImage.find(src, min, max);
00247                         break;
00248                 case FIT_UINT16:        
00249                         minmaxUShortImage.find(src, min, max);
00250                         break;
00251                 case FIT_INT16:         
00252                         minmaxShortImage.find(src, min, max);
00253                         break;
00254                 case FIT_UINT32:        
00255                         minmaxULongImage.find(src, min, max);
00256                         break;
00257                 case FIT_INT32:         
00258                         minmaxLongImage.find(src, min, max);
00259                         break;
00260                 case FIT_FLOAT:         
00261                         minmaxFloatImage.find(src, min, max);
00262                         break;  
00263                 case FIT_DOUBLE:                
00264                         minmaxDoubleImage.find(src, min, max);
00265                         break;  
00266         }
00267 }

00269 
00270 static int FindMaxChannelValue(unsigned int pixel_value)
00271 {
00272         unsigned char red_value = pixel_value >> FI_RGBA_RED_SHIFT;
00273         unsigned char green_value = pixel_value >> FI_RGBA_GREEN_SHIFT;
00274         unsigned char blue_value = pixel_value >> FI_RGBA_BLUE_SHIFT;
00275 
00276         return MAX(MAX(red_value, green_value), blue_value);
00277 }
00278 
00279 
00280 void DLL_CALLCONV
00281 FreeImageAlgorithms_FindMinMaxForColourImage(FIBITMAP *src, double *min, double *max)
00282 {
00283         if( !src || FreeImage_GetImageType(src) != FIT_BITMAP)
00284                 return;
00285 
00286         if( FreeImage_GetBPP(src) != 24)
00287                 return;
00288 
00289         int width = FreeImage_GetWidth(src);
00290         int height = FreeImage_GetHeight(src);
00291 
00292         unsigned int tmp_value;
00293         
00294         unsigned int *bits = (unsigned int *) FreeImage_GetBits(src); 
00295         
00296         double temp_min = FindMaxChannelValue(bits[0]);
00297         double temp_max = temp_min;
00298 
00299         for(int y = 0; y < height; y++) {
00300 
00301                 bits = reinterpret_cast<unsigned int *>(FreeImage_GetScanLine(src, y));
00302 
00303                 for(int x = 0; x < width; x++) {
00304 
00305                         tmp_value = FindMaxChannelValue(bits[x]);
00306 
00307                         if(tmp_value < temp_min)
00308                                 temp_min = tmp_value;
00309 
00310                         if(tmp_value > temp_max)
00311                                 temp_max = tmp_value;
00312                 }
00313         }
00314 
00315         *min = static_cast<double>(temp_min);
00316         *max = static_cast<double>(temp_max);
00317 }

00380 int DLL_CALLCONV
00381 FreeImageAlgorithms_IsGreyScale(FIBITMAP *src)
00382 {
00383         FREE_IMAGE_TYPE image_type = FreeImage_GetImageType(src);
00384 
00385         switch(image_type)
00386         {
00387                 case
00388                          FIT_RGB16:
00389                          FIT_RGBA16:
00390                          FIT_RGBF:
00391                          FIT_RGBAF:
00392                 {
00393                         return 0;
00394                 }
00395 
00396                 case FIT_BITMAP:
00397                 {
00398                         int bpp = FreeImage_GetBPP(src);
00399 
00400                         if(bpp >= 16)
00401                                 return 0;
00402                 }
00403         }
00404 
00405         return 1;
00406 }

00471 void DLL_CALLCONV
00472 FreeImageAlgorithms_GetMaxPosibleValueForFib(FIBITMAP *src, double *max)
00473 {
00474         if(!src)
00475                 return;
00476 
00477         FREE_IMAGE_TYPE src_type = FreeImage_GetImageType(src);
00478 
00479         switch(src_type) {
00480                 case FIT_BITMAP:        // standard image: 1-, 4-, 8-, 16-, 24-, 32-bit
00481                         
00482                         if(FreeImage_GetBPP(src) == 8)
00483                                 *max = UCHAR_MAX;
00484 
00485                         break;
00486 
00487                 case FIT_UINT16:        
00488                         *max = USHRT_MAX;
00489                         break;
00490 
00491                 case FIT_INT16:         
00492                         *max = SHRT_MAX;
00493                         break;
00494 
00495                 case FIT_UINT32:        
00496                         *max = UINT_MAX;
00497                         break;
00498 
00499                 case FIT_INT32:         
00500                         *max = INT_MAX;
00501                         break;
00502 
00503                 case FIT_FLOAT:         
00504                         *max = FLT_MAX;
00505                         break;  
00506         }
00507 }

00510 void DLL_CALLCONV
00511 FreeImageAlgorithms_GetMinPosibleValueForFib(FIBITMAP *src, double *min)
00512 {
00513         if(!src)
00514                 return;
00515 
00516         FREE_IMAGE_TYPE src_type = FreeImage_GetImageType(src);
00517 
00518         switch(src_type) {
00519                 case FIT_BITMAP:        // standard image: 1-, 4-, 8-, 16-, 24-, 32-bit
00520                         
00521                         if(FreeImage_GetBPP(src) == 8)
00522                                 *min = 0;
00523 
00524                         break;
00525 
00526                 case FIT_UINT16:        
00527                         *min = 0;
00528                         break;
00529 
00530                 case FIT_INT16:         
00531                         *min = SHRT_MIN;
00532                         break;
00533 
00534                 case FIT_UINT32:        
00535                         *min = 0;
00536                         break;
00537 
00538                 case FIT_INT32:         
00539                         *min = INT_MIN;
00540                         break;
00541 
00542                 case FIT_FLOAT:         
00543                         *min = FLT_MIN;
00544                         break;  
00545         }
00546 }
00547 
00548 int DLL_CALLCONV
00549 FreeImageAlgorithms_Is16BitReally12BitImage(FIBITMAP *src)
00550 {
00551         unsigned int x, width, height, *bptr;
00552 
00553         // Future work! Can proceed 8 pixels at once using xmm registers (128 bit registers).
00554         // Is Assembly Code possible in labwindows ? 
00555 
00556         // We want to know if there are some bits set at 0xF000 ie 1111 0000 0000 0000
00557         // and we will use the advantage of 32bit CPU: 
00558         #define MASK_12BIT 0xF000F000     // 1111 0000 0000 0000   1111 0000 0000 0000
00559 
00560         if( !src || FreeImage_GetImageType(src) == FIT_BITMAP)
00561                 return 0;
00562 
00563         if( FreeImage_GetBPP(src) != 16)
00564                 return 0;
00565 
00566         width  = FreeImage_GetWidth(src);
00567         height = FreeImage_GetHeight(src);
00568         
00569         // we need to change ptr size to 32bit 
00570         // bits should be aligned to 4 Bytes 
00571         bptr = (unsigned int *) FreeImage_GetBits(src); 
00572         
00573         x = (width * height) / 2; // 2 pixels at once 
00574                 
00575         do { // this loop will skip one conditional jump 
00576 
00577                 // let's avoid [] operator 
00578                 if(*bptr++ & MASK_12BIT)
00579                         return 0;
00580                                                 
00581         } while(--x);
00582                 
00583         // There can be one leftover
00584         if(width & 1) { 
00585                         
00586                 if(*(short*)bptr & (short) MASK_12BIT)
00587                         return 0;
00588         } 
00589 
00590         return 1;
00591 }
00592 
00593 
00594 /* Gets the values of the pixels along a line calculated using the Midpoint Line algorithm */
00595 template <class T> int
00596 GetPixelValuesForLine (FIBITMAP *src, POINT p1, POINT p2, T *values) 
00597 {  
00598         T value;
00599         int swapped = 0, dx, dy, incrN, incrE, incrNE, d, x, y, slope, tmp_y, len = 0;
00600   
00601         // If necessary, switch the points so we're 
00602         // always drawing from left to right. 
00603         if (p2.x < p1.x) { 
00604                 swapped = 1;
00605         SWAP(p1, p2);
00606         }
00607    
00608         dx = p2.x - p1.x;                                  
00609         dy = p2.y - p1.y; 
00610    
00611         if(dy < 0) {
00612                 slope = -1;
00613                 dy = -dy;
00614         }
00615         else {
00616                 slope = 1;
00617         }
00618    
00619         x = p1.x; 
00620     y = p1.y;
00621    
00622         if (abs(dy) <= dx) { 
00623  
00624                 d = 2 * dy - dx; 
00625                 incrE = 2 * dy;                 // E
00626                 incrNE = 2 * (dy - dx); // NE
00627                 
00628                 T *bits = (T *)FreeImage_GetScanLine(src, y);
00629                 value = bits[x];
00630 
00631         *values++ = value;
00632    
00633         while (x < p2.x) { 
00634     
00635            if (d <= 0) { 
00636                d += incrE;              // Going to E
00637                x++; 
00638            } 
00639            else { 
00640            
00641                d += incrNE;     // Going to NE
00642                x++; 
00643                y += slope; 
00644            } 
00645            
00646            T *bits = (T *)FreeImage_GetScanLine(src, y);
00647                    value = bits[x];
00648 
00649            *values++ = value;
00650            len++;
00651         } 
00652         }
00653         else {
00654    
00655                 d = dy - 2 * dx; 
00656                 incrN = 2 * -dx;                // N
00657                 incrNE = 2 * (dy - dx); // NE
00658   
00659                 tmp_y = 0;
00660    
00661                 T *bits = (T *)FreeImage_GetScanLine(src, y);
00662                 value = bits[x];
00663 
00664         *values++ = value;
00665    
00666         for ( tmp_y = 0; tmp_y < abs(p2.y - p1.y); tmp_y++ ) { 
00667     
00668                 if (d > 0) {
00669            
00670                 d += incrN;             // Going to N
00671                 y += slope;
00672                 } 
00673                 else { 
00674            
00675                         d += incrNE;            // Going to NE
00676                 y += slope; 
00677                 x++;
00678                 } 
00679            
00680                 T *bits = (T *)FreeImage_GetScanLine(src, y);
00681                         value = bits[x];
00682 
00683                 *values++ = value;
00684                 len++;
00685        } 
00686    }
00687    
00688         // Reverse if the line draws from right to left.
00689         //if(swapped > 0) 
00690         //      FreeImageAlgorithms_ArrayReverse(values, len);
00691 
00692    return len;
00693 }

00732 
00733 /* Midpoint Line algorithm */
00734 int DLL_CALLCONV
00735 FreeImageAlgorithms_GetRGBPixelValuesForLine (FIBITMAP *src, POINT p1, POINT p2, char *red_values, char *green_values, char *blue_values) 
00736 {  
00737         RGBQUAD value;
00738         int dx, dy, incrN, incrE, incrNE, d, x, y, slope, tmp_y, len = 0; 
00739    
00740         // If necessary, switch the points so we're 
00741         // always drawing from left to right. 
00742         if (p2.x < p1.x) { 
00743         int t; 
00744        
00745         t = p2.x; 
00746         p2.x = p1.x; 
00747         p1.x = t;
00748        
00749         t = p2.y; 
00750         p2.y = p1.y; 
00751         p1.y = t; 
00752         } 
00753    
00754         dx = p2.x - p1.x;                                  
00755         dy = p2.y - p1.y; 
00756    
00757         if(dy < 0) {
00758                 slope = -1;
00759                 dy = -dy;
00760         }
00761         else {
00762                 slope = 1;
00763         }
00764    
00765         x = p1.x; 
00766     y = p1.y;
00767    
00768         if (abs(dy) <= dx) { 
00769  
00770                 d = 2 * dy - dx; 
00771                 incrE = 2 * dy;                 // E
00772                 incrNE = 2 * (dy - dx); // NE
00773   
00774                 FreeImage_GetPixelColor(src, x, y, &value);
00775                 *red_values++ = value.rgbRed;
00776                 *green_values++ = value.rgbGreen;
00777                 *blue_values++ = value.rgbBlue;
00778    
00779         while (x < p2.x) { 
00780     
00781            if (d <= 0) { 
00782                d += incrE;              // Going to E
00783                x++; 
00784            } 
00785            else { 
00786            
00787                d += incrNE;     // Going to NE
00788                x++; 
00789                y += slope; 
00790            } 
00791            
00792            FreeImage_GetPixelColor(src, x, y, &value);
00793                    *red_values++ = value.rgbRed;
00794                    *green_values++ = value.rgbGreen;
00795                    *blue_values++ = value.rgbBlue; 
00796                         
00797            len++;
00798         } 
00799         }
00800         else {
00801    
00802                 d = dy - 2 * dx; 
00803                 incrN = 2 * -dx;                // N
00804                 incrNE = 2 * (dy - dx); // NE
00805   
00806                 tmp_y = 0;
00807    
00808                 FreeImage_GetPixelColor(src, x, y, &value);
00809                 *red_values++ = value.rgbRed;
00810                 *green_values++ = value.rgbGreen;
00811                 *blue_values++ = value.rgbBlue; 
00812    
00813         for ( tmp_y = 0; tmp_y < abs(p2.y - p1.y); tmp_y++ ) { 
00814     
00815                 if (d > 0) {
00816            
00817                 d += incrN;             // Going to N
00818                 y += slope;
00819                 } 
00820                 else { 
00821            
00822                         d += incrNE;            // Going to NE
00823                 y += slope; 
00824                 x++;
00825                 } 
00826            
00827                 FreeImage_GetPixelColor(src, x, y, &value);
00828                         *red_values++ = value.rgbRed;
00829                         *green_values++ = value.rgbGreen;
00830                         *blue_values++ = value.rgbBlue;
00831                 
00832                 len++;
00833        } 
00834    }
00835    
00836    return len;
00837 } 
00838 
00839 
00840 void DLL_CALLCONV
00841 FreeImageAlgorithms_GetDistanceMap (int width, int height, int *distance_map) 
00842 {  
00843         int xcentre = (int) (width / 2 + 0.5);
00844         int ycentre = (int) (height / 2 + 0.5);
00845                 
00846         int tmp_min;
00847 
00848         distance_map = (int *) malloc(width * height * sizeof(float));
00849 
00850         for (int y = 0; y < height; y++)
00851         {
00852                 for (int x = 0; x < width; x++)
00853                 {
00854                         if (x <= xcentre)
00855                                 tmp_min = x;
00856                         else
00857                                 tmp_min = width - x;
00858 
00859                         if (y <= ycentre)
00860                                 distance_map[y * width + x] = MIN(tmp_min, y);
00861                         else
00862                                 distance_map[y * width + x] = MIN(tmp_min, height - y);
00863                 }
00864         }
00865 }
00866 
00867 
00868 int DLL_CALLCONV
00869 FreeImageAlgorithms_SimplePaste(FIBITMAP *dst, FIBITMAP *src, int left, int top)
00870 {
00871         int src_height = FreeImage_GetHeight(src);
00872         int dst_height = FreeImage_GetHeight(dst);
00873         int dst_pitch =  FreeImage_GetPitch(dst);
00874 
00875         int src_line_bytes = FreeImage_GetLine(src);
00876 
00877         // calculate the number of bytes per pixel
00878         int bytespp = FreeImage_GetLine(dst) / FreeImage_GetWidth(dst);
00879 
00880         int dst_scan_line = dst_height - src_height - top;
00881         BYTE *dst_bits = FreeImage_GetScanLine(dst, dst_scan_line);
00882         dst_bits += (left * bytespp);
00883 
00884         BYTE *src_bits;
00885 
00886         for(int i=0; i < src_height; i++)
00887         {
00888                 src_bits = FreeImage_GetScanLine(src, i);
00889                 memcpy(dst_bits, src_bits, src_line_bytes);
00890                 dst_bits += dst_pitch;
00891         }
00892 
00893         return FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_SUCCESS;
00894 }
00895 
00896 int DLL_CALLCONV
00897 FreeImageAlgorithms_BitwiseCompare(FIBITMAP *dib1, FIBITMAP *dib2)
00898 {
00899         if(!dib1 || !dib2)
00900                 return 0;
00901 
00902         if(FreeImage_GetBPP(dib1) != FreeImage_GetBPP(dib2))
00903                 return 0;
00904 
00905         if(FreeImage_GetImageType(dib1) != FreeImage_GetImageType(dib2))
00906                 return 0;
00907 
00908         if(FreeImage_GetWidth(dib1) != FreeImage_GetWidth(dib2))
00909                 return 0;
00910 
00911         if(FreeImage_GetHeight(dib1) != FreeImage_GetHeight(dib2))
00912                 return 0;
00913 
00914         if(FreeImage_GetPitch(dib1) != FreeImage_GetPitch(dib2))
00915                 return 0;
00916 
00917         int size = (FreeImage_GetPitch(dib1) * FreeImage_GetHeight(dib1)) / 4;
00918 
00919         int *ptr1 = (int *) FreeImage_GetBits(dib1);
00920         int *ptr2 = (int *) FreeImage_GetBits(dib2);
00921 
00922         for(int i=0; i < size; i++)
00923         {
00924                 if(*ptr1++ != *ptr2++)
00925                         return 0;
00926         }
00927 
00928         return 1;
00929 }
00930 
00931 
00932 FIBITMAP* DLL_CALLCONV
00933 FreeImageAlgorithms_CloneImageType(FIBITMAP *src, int width, int height)
00934 {
00935         FREE_IMAGE_TYPE type = FreeImage_GetImageType(src);
00936         int bpp = FreeImage_GetBPP(src);
00937         unsigned red_mask = FreeImage_GetRedMask(src);
00938         unsigned green_mask = FreeImage_GetGreenMask(src);
00939         unsigned blue_mask = FreeImage_GetBlueMask(src);
00940 
00941         FIBITMAP *dst = FreeImage_AllocateT(type, width, height, 
00942                 bpp, red_mask, green_mask, blue_mask);
00943 
00944         // If 8bit image we must clone the palette
00945         if(bpp <= 8)
00946                 FreeImageAlgorithms_CopyPalette(src, dst);
00947 
00948         return dst;
00949 }
00950 
00951 FIABITMAP DLL_CALLCONV
00952 FreeImageAlgorithms_AddBorder(FIBITMAP *src, int border)
00953 {
00954         int width = FreeImage_GetWidth(src);
00955         int height = FreeImage_GetHeight(src);
00956 
00957         FIABITMAP dst;
00958         
00959         dst.fib = FreeImageAlgorithms_CloneImageType(src, width + (2 *border), height + (2 * border));
00960 
00961         dst.border = border;
00962 
00963         FreeImageAlgorithms_SimplePaste(dst.fib, src, border, border);
00964 
00965         return dst;
00966 }
